entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:15 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 2:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
